Tapping it will make Noctua fly one circle around the equipped character, dealing <color=#0f70bc>320%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies nearby while granting the character Super Armor for <color=#0f70bc>3s</color> and a shield with capacity equal to <color=#0f70bc>80%</color> of the CUB's Attack for 10s.

Name: Awakening Flash: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Toniris charge forward, dealing <color=#0f70bc>300%</color> Physical DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Physical attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>120%</color> AOE Physical DMG. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Data Attack</color>.

Name: Surging Thunderbolt: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After tapping it, Toniris and the character in control will charge forward together, dealing <color=#0f70bc>300%</color> Physical DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Physical attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>120%</color> AOE Physical DMG. The equipped character is invincible while charging with Toniris. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Data Attack</color>.

After tapping it, Toniris and the character in control will charge forward together, dealing <color=#0f70bc>1500%</color> Lightning DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Lightning attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>600%</color> AOE Lightning DMG. The equipped character is invincible while charging with Toniris. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Advanced Data Attack</color>.

Upon casting, Frost Oath will stomp from above, dealing <color=#0f70bc>600%</color> Nihil DMG and applying <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color> to the target and generate a <color=#935ee1>Snowthorn Forest</color> field, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Nihil DMG for <color=#0f70bc>4s</color>. Adds <color=#935ee1>Data ATK</color>. <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color>: Immobilizes the enemy for 2s.

Unleashing the <color=#0f70bc>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> will summon the Forest Guard to fire a volley on the target's location in a large area, dealing <color=#0f70bc>1600%</color> Physical DMG.

Name: Forest Guard Volley
Desc: Rosetta: Rigor summons the Forest Guard to perform a clustered attack when she charges the <color=#0f70bc>Low/Mid-power Electromagnetic Cannon</color>, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color>/<color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG to enemies in front, and slow down the enemies. Unleashing the <color=#0f70bc>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> will summon the Forest Guard to fire a volley on the target's location in a large area, dealing <color=#0f70bc>2000%</color> Physical DMG.

Name: Grenade Carnival: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Seeshell expand its shells to launch <color=#0f70bc>1</color> grenade from the turret. Each time Seeshell fires a grenade, there is a <color=#0f70bc>78%</color> chance to fire <color=#0f70bc>1</color> additional grenade, up to a total of <color=#0f70bc>9</color> grenades. Each grenade deals <color=#0f70bc>50%</color> AOE Physical DMG.

Name: Supergravity Eclipse: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Upon casting, Moonhopper will teleport into the air and smash to the ground, interrupting enemy skills, dealing <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> Physical DMG, and creating an Anti-gravity Field that deals <color=#0f70bc>20%</color> Physical DMG to all enemies inside every 0.5s for 4s. Enemies inside the Anti-gravity field will be slowed down and unable to use their skills.

Upon casting, Moonhopper will teleport into the air and smash to the ground, interrupting enemy skills, dealing <color=#0f70bc>800%</color> Physical DMG, and creating an Anti-gravity Field that deals <color=#0f70bc>400%</color> Physical DMG upon its creation. The Anti-gravity Field lasts 2s, in which enemies will be slowed down and unable to use their skills.

Name: Ion Realm: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Hades Fangs will spin in mid-air and slam the enemy, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG and applying <color=#0f70bc>Rigidity</color> to the enemy. Name: Proximity Interference: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available.
